ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] How to complete the job without click the button
ygData.msgSnippet: in think you want to set the crawlController bean s pauseAtStart property to false. it is true by default in H3. /steve@archive.org

in think you want to set the crawlController bean's pauseAtStart
property to false. it is true by default in H3.

/steve@...


On 8/25/10 8:07 AM, eimhee wrote:
> 
> 
> I use Heritrix3,
> Always I should click build -> lanuch-> unpause to complete the crawling,
> How to run Heritrix3 without click the button, and Heritrix3 itself will 
> complete the job.
